dict.string: Bumpin uses the microphone for voice chat in discussions and parties so you can talk with other users.
Bumpin needs access to your Apple Music library to sync music with friends in parties and to help you log and rate your favorite songs.
Bumpin uses your location to help you discover nearby music parties and connect with other music lovers in your area.
Bumpin uses the camera to let you take photos for your music reviews and profile pictures.
Bumpin accesses your photo library to let you select images for your profile and music reviews.
Bumpin can access your contacts to help you find and connect with friends who also use the app.
